Instruction: In a microwave-safe container, combine the lemon wedges, 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons of water, lemon juice, and salt.
Microwave the mixture for a total duration of 10 minutes, pausing to stir every 2 minutes to prevent overflow.
Pour the concoction into a sanitized jar with a tight lid. Allow it to rest for 24 hours before utilizing."
